thread.title: Larry Birchler Shady Shores, TX
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Larry Birchler Shady Shores, TX

author: Larry Birchler Shady Shores, TX
title: Larry Birchler Shady Shores, TX
text:
We have been purchasing Bacon Steak from Burger's for a number of years now and it is the best bacon you can get anywhere. When our friends visit and have breakfast, they all go bonkers over the bacon and ask us where we purchase it.
We also purchase burnt ends and turkey that is equally good.
You can always count on receiving your product on-time and damage free.
Trust your instincts, trust my review and give Burger's Smokehouse a try...you won't be disappointed.
